name: Instagram Simple Dark
description: Just made this because i was bored and hated the whiteness of Instagram, hope you like it :)
additional_info:
First version, please comment or email me if i should change something on it! :)

V0.1 Changes:
- Added darkness to the comment section next to a picture when you click on it, in your profile for example.
- Added darkness to the edit profile page.
V0.2 Changes:
- Made the bottom border at the top white, making it look a bit nicer with the pictures in the middle.
V0.3
- Updated it for latest update from Instagram.
- Revamped whole edit profile page.
V0.4
- Changed color of comment section next to the profile pictures.
V0.5
- Changed bottom bar color to same as background color.
- Removed code for the sidebar at edit profile because i couldn't change the color.
V0.6
- Changed comment box in "open link in new window" from profile to dark grey. Forgot to change it.
